verses.verse: This <S%H2088><s%> is the book <S%H5612><s%> of the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Adam. <S%H121><s%> In the day <S%H3117><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> man, <S%H120><s%> in the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he him;

Male <S%H2145><s%> and female <S%H5347><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> he them; and blessed <S%H1288><s%> them, and called <S%H7121><s%> their name <S%H8034><s%> Adam, <S%H120><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> when they were created. <S%H1254><s%>

And Adam <S%H121><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begat <S%H3205><s%> a son in his own likeness, <S%H1823><s%> and after his image; <S%H6754><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Seth: <S%H8352><s%>

And the days <S%H3117><s%> of Adam <S%H121><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he had begotten <S%H3205><s%> Seth <S%H8352><s%> were eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years: <S%H8141><s%> and he begat <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters: <S%H1323><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> that Adam <S%H121><s%> lived <S%H2425><s%> were nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> years: <S%H8141><s%> and he died. <S%H4191><s%>
And Seth <S%H8352><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begat <S%H3205><s%> Enos: <S%H583><s%>

And Seth <S%H8352><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> Enos <S%H583><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begat <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters: <S%H1323><s%>
And all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of Seth <S%H8352><s%> were nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> years: <S%H8141><s%> and he died. <S%H4191><s%>
And Enos <S%H583><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> ninety <S%H8673><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begat <S%H3205><s%> Cainan: <S%H7018><s%>

And Enos <S%H583><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> Cainan <S%H7018><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifteen <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begat <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters: <S%H1323><s%>
And all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of Enos <S%H583><s%> were nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years: <S%H8141><s%> and he died. <S%H4191><s%>
And Cainan <S%H7018><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>and begat <S%H3205><s%> Mahalaleel: <S%H4111><s%>

And Cainan <S%H7018><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> Mahalaleel <S%H4111><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begat <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters: <S%H1323><s%>
And all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of Cainan <S%H7018><s%> were nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> years: <S%H8141><s%> and he died. <S%H4191><s%>
And Mahalaleel <S%H4111><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begat <S%H3205><s%> Jared: <S%H3382><s%>

And Mahalaleel <S%H4111><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> Jared <S%H3382><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begat <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters: <S%H1323><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of Mahalaleel <S%H4111><s%> were eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> ninety <S%H8673><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years: <S%H8141><s%> and he died. <S%H4191><s%>
And Jared <S%H3382><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> an hundred <S%H3967><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and he begat <S%H3205><s%> Enoch: <S%H2585><s%>

And Jared <S%H3382><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> Enoch <S%H2585><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begat <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters: <S%H1323><s%>

And Enoch <S%H2585><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begat <S%H3205><s%> Methuselah: <S%H4968><s%>

And Enoch <S%H2585><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> with God <S%H430><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> Methuselah <S%H4968><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begat <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters: <S%H1323><s%>
And all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of Enoch <S%H2585><s%> were three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years: <S%H8141><s%>
And Enoch <S%H2585><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> with God: <S%H430><s%> and he was not; for God <S%H430><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> him.
And Methuselah <S%H4968><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> an hundred <S%H3967><s%> eighty <S%H8084><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begat <S%H3205><s%> Lamech. <S%H3929><s%>

And Methuselah <S%H4968><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> Lamech <S%H3929><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> eighty <S%H8084><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begat <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters: <S%H1323><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of Methuselah <S%H4968><s%> were nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> and nine <S%H8672><s%> years: <S%H8141><s%> and he died. <S%H4191><s%>
And Lamech <S%H3929><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> an hundred <S%H3967><s%> eighty <S%H8084><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begat <S%H3205><s%> a son: <S%H1121><s%>

And he called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Noah, <S%H5146><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> same shall comfort <S%H5162><s%> us concerning our work <S%H4639><s%> and toil <S%H6093><s%> of our hands, <S%H3027><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has cursed. <S%H779><s%>

And Lamech <S%H3929><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> Noah <S%H5146><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> ninety <S%H8673><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and begat <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters: <S%H1323><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of Lamech <S%H3929><s%> were seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> years: <S%H8141><s%> and he died. <S%H4191><s%>

And Noah <S%H5146><s%> was five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old: <S%H1121><s%> and Noah <S%H5146><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Shem, <S%H8035><s%> Ham, <S%H2526><s%> and Japheth. <S%H3315><s%>
